mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spider_config ( common_url, target_url, url_rule, growth_pattern, start_num, end_num, group_name, item_name, site_name, domain, charset, user_agent, cookies, sleep_time, retry_times, time_out, thread, match_fields, headers, generated_time, db_type, db_address, db_name, db_username, db_password, db_table )VALUES ( #{commonUrl}, #{targetUrl}, #{urlRule}, #{growthPattern}, #{startNum}, #{endNum}, #{groupName}, #{itemName}, #{siteName}, #{domain}, #{charset}, #{userAgent}, #{cookies}, #{sleepTime}, #{retryTimes}, #{timeOut}, #{thread}, #{matchFields}, #{headers}, #{generatedTime}, #{dbType}, #{dbAddress}, #{dbName}, #{dbUserName}, #{dbPassWord}, #{dbTable} )
